org.forgerock.openidm.sync

Class PropertyMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.sync.PropertyMapping

  • public class PropertyMapping
extends Object
    This class contains the necessary logic to map an attribute from the source object to an attribute on the target object. It optionally contains a condition and transform scripts..

                          org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer pointer,
                          Object value)
                   throws SynchronizationException
        Puts the value on the target object attribute.
        Parameters:
        targetObject - the target object.
        pointer - the target attribute.
        value - the target attribute's value.
        Throws:
        SynchronizationException - if errors are encountered.

      • apply

        public void apply(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue sourceObject,
                  org.forgerock.json.JsonValue oldSource,
                  org.forgerock.json.JsonValue targetObject,
                  org.forgerock.json.JsonValue oldTarget,
                  String linkQualifier,
                  org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
           throws SynchronizationException
        Applies this property mapping on the supplied source and target objects if no link qualifier has been configured, or the supplied link qualifier matches the configure one. This may execute condition and transform scripts if any are configured.
        Parameters:
        sourceObject - Current specified source property/object to map from
        oldSource - oldSource an optional previous source object before the change(s) that triggered the sync, null if not provided
        targetObject - Current specified target property/object to modify
        oldTarget - Existing, unmodified, target object
        linkQualifier - the link qualifier associated with the current sync
        context - a Context associated with this call
        Throws:
        SynchronizationException - if errors are encountered.

      • evaluateCondition

        public boolean evaluateCondition(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue sourceObject,
                                 org.forgerock.json.JsonValue oldSource,
                                 org.forgerock.json.JsonValue targetObject,
                                 org.forgerock.json.JsonValue oldTarget,
                                 String linkQualifier,
                                 org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
                          throws SynchronizationException
        Evaluates a property mapping condition. Returns true if the condition passes, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        sourceObject - Current specified source property/object to map from
        oldSource - oldSource an optional previous source object before the change(s) that triggered the sync, null if not provided
        targetObject - Current specified target property/object to modify
        linkQualifier - the link qualifier associated with the current sync
        context - a Context associated with this call
        Returns:
        true if the condition passes, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SynchronizationException - if errors are encountered.

      • hasTransformScript

        public boolean hasTransformScript()
        Determines if PropertyMapping has a transform-script.
        Returns:
        true if PropertyMapping has a transform-script and false otherwise
